EmailTemplate.name: WF_Approved_All_new
EmailTemplate.subject: Approved eGreensheet Notification:{!Workflow_Notification_History__c.WorkFlow_ID__c} - {!Workflow_Notification_History__c.Customer_Name__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello,
The business case approval eGreensheet item {!Workflow_Notification_History__c.WorkFlow_ID__c} has been approved by all approvers.
Please Click Here to view details.
Thank You.
